title: Care of the skin
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Care and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Skin
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases - Causes and theories of causation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Skin - Care and hygiene
description: Encourages cleanliness by showing the daily grooming rituals of three children: Fred, Billy and Virginia. Portrays children as they prepare for bed, showing the proper way to wash hands and face and to bathe. Common skin ailments are illustrated. Animated diagrams describe the structure of the skin and explain why soap is necessary for cleanliness.
